name: Orbi´dāshu
description:
You are a solitary space samurai roaming the very edges of the known universe, relishing in the sweet sounds of the cosmic music. Then suddenly the serenity is disturbed by an occurrence of enormous proportions - the genesis of a black hole.

Now dash from planet to planet and perfectly time your cuts and jumps in order to escape the unstoppable nebula!

Features Interplanetary Gardener

While racing around a planet you will encounter the local flora - bamboo sticks. Cutting these down will significantly increase your velocity.

Escaping Gravity

Be careful to gain enough acceleration before attempting to jump off a planet - if you do not have enough momentum to reach the next sphere you will inevitably be sucked in by the black hole.

Controls Story Trailer Credits Trailer by:

Direction and editing: Ulrich Koller

Artwork and animation: Luise Koller

Voice-acting: Teo Crawford

Orbi´dāshu was developed as a student project at the University of Applied Sciences in Salzburg.
